MeasurementÔÉÅ

class openmsimodel.entity.base.measurement.Measurement(name: str, *, notes: Optional[str] = None, conditions: Optional[list[gemd.entity.attribute.condition.Condition]] = None, parameters: Optional[list[gemd.entity.attribute.parameter.Parameter]] = None, properties: Optional[list[gemd.entity.attribute.property.Property]] = None, material: Optional[MaterialRun] = None)ÔÉÅ

Bases: ProcessOrMeasurement

Base element for measurements.

property spec: MeasurementSpecÔÉÅ

The underlying measurement spec.

property run: MeasurementRunÔÉÅ

The underlying measurement run.

classmethod from_spec_or_run(name: str, *, notes: Optional[str] = None, spec: Optional[MeasurementSpec] = None, run: Optional[MeasurementRun] = None) → MeasurementÔÉÅ

Instantiate a Measurement from a spec or run with appropriate validation.

Note that the spec‚Äôs template will be set to the class template, and the run‚Äôs spec will be set to this spec.

get_material() → strÔÉÅ

Get the name of the material on sstate the measurement run was performed.

set_material(material: Optional[MaterialRun]) → NoneÔÉÅ

Set the material on sstate the measurement run was performed.

Parameters:

material ‚Äì {MaterialRun, None} The measurement‚Äôs material.

get_properties_dict()ÔÉÅ

Return a dict of measurement run properties. The keys are the names of the properties. Each value is a dict containing a value dict and origin str.

update_properties(properties: Property, replace_all: bool = False) → NoneÔÉÅ

Change or add measured properties of the measurement run. properties: Property The properties to change (by name) or add. replace_all: bool, default False If True, remove any existing properties before adding new ones.

remove_properties(*property_names: str) → NoneÔÉÅ

Remove measured properties from the measurement run by name.

property_names: str

The names of properties to remove.
